mapper.sql: posse_confirmt_id, propert_id, confirm_no, creditor_name, creditor_sign, no_code, contract_time, guarantee, guarantee_no, assets_company_name, assets_card, assets_date, legal_represen, legal_represen_date, obligor, obligor_sign, obligor_idcard, obligor_date
mapper.select: SELECT `bus_assignment_confirm`.confirm_no FROM bus_assignment_confirm ORDER BY `bus_assignment_confirm`.posse_confirmt_id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT br.data2 as 'debtIdCard',br.data3 as 'debtPhonePri',br.data5 as 'debtPhoneCor',br.report_propert as 'debtPropert', brp.data2 as 'perIdCard',brp.data3 as 'perPhonePri',brp.data5 as 'perPhoneCor',brp.report_propert as 'perPropert', br.report_id,bc.`civil_id`,br.`data1` AS 'debtName',brp.`data1` AS 'personName',pd.`amount_this`,baa.assignment_agreement_no,bac.`contract_time`,bac.confirm_no FROM bus_propert bp LEFT JOIN bus_report br ON bp.`report_id` = br.`report_id` LEFT JOIN bus_relative_person brp ON brp.`relative_per_id` = bp.`relative_per_id` LEFT JOIN pub_debt pd ON pd.`debt_id` = bp.`debt_id` LEFT JOIN bus_assignment_agreement baa ON baa.`propert_id` = bp.`propert_id` LEFT JOIN bus_civil bc ON bc.`civil_id` = bp.`civil_id` LEFT JOIN bus_assignment_confirm bac ON bac.`propert_id` = bp.`propert_id` WHERE bp.propert_id = #{propertId}
mapper.insert:
insert into bus_assignment_confirm
posse_confirmt_id,
propert_id,
confirm_no,
creditor_name,
creditor_sign,
no_code,
contract_time,
guarantee,
assets_company_name,
assets_card,
assets_date,
legal_represen,
legal_represen_date,
obligor,
obligor_sign,
obligor_idcard,
obligor_date,

mapper.update:
update bus_assignment_confirm
propert_id = #{propertId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
confirm_no = #{confirmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creditor_name = #{creditorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creditor_sign = #{creditorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
no_code = #{noCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_time = #{contractTime,jdbcType=DATE},
guarantee = #{guarantee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assets_company_name = #{assetsCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assets_card = #{assetsCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assets_date = #{assetsDate,jdbcType=DATE},
legal_represen = #{legalRepresen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_represen_date = #{legalRepresenDate,jdbcType=DATE},
obligor = #{obligor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
obligor_sign = #{obligorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
obligor_idcard = #{obligorIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
obligor_date = #{obligorDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where posse_confirmt_id = #{posseConfirmtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
